Html:
Hi, I'm using Goblin XNA, but when I run Tutorial 8, Visual Studio 9 give me a problem with ALVARWrapper DLL. It says he can not connect to this dll.

Can someone help me!!

Another question....

I am a student of University of Salento (Lecce, Italy). I would to know if I can freely use Goblin XNA(v3.4) for my thesis project.

In addition I would to know, if ARtag library, has time costraints like ALVAR.

Thanks for availability and for your attention

Yes, you can use Goblin free for whatever you like. The only license fee is the marker tracking library if you're doing commercial stuff.

Both ARTag and ALVAR has time constraints.

Ohan
